column5:
The first random shiny I caught (and kept) was a psyduck in the gem 4 safari zone. That feeling of panic lingers even after success lolol.

The first random shiny I actually caught was a solrock in Ruby, but my gameboy advance was low on battery and I had to change them out. I caught the solrock, went to save, and it immediately died üò∂
snow boots (dyed white), climbing gear (dyed purple) and sheik‚Äôs mask! +1 stealth, +1 climb speed, faster snow travel! Helps me focus my priorities in the icy region

Tbh tho my wolf link is an Amazon-purchased amiibo card. Normally, you would get a 3-Heart wolf link with the wolf amiibo, then have to do the twilight princess hd cave of shadows to max out the hearts
he‚Äôs been eating his meat stew
Fascism has been j*rking this republic off for a while now and we‚Äôve been closing our eyes and imagining it was democracy
This episode of history is getting real fucked up :/

I made a separate twitter account, linked it to my switch, then I upload clips and pics to Twitter, move to my laptop to use/share/download media as needed, it‚Äôs pretty quick once you get used to it I guess

I‚Äôm sort of in the same boat with my emotions.  I had been going through such a chaotic January and February that was just starting to calm down, so the hysteria around me feels no more overwhelming than what I was dealing with before. 

I‚Äôm mostly worried about things escalating and causing another spiral just when I need to be the most stable. This really is an uncertain time :/

Kind of like

What I WANT to do is be myself, or at least find myself

What I‚Äôm SUPPOSED to do is be quiet and respectful

Now as an adult, I‚Äôm caught between these ideologies that have been ingrained. I guess it‚Äôs best to accept the grey between?
Me when majora‚Äôs mask 3D was announced

I recently crashed after a manic episode triggered by quitting lamictal cold turkey (similar issue, no refills and not enough time to contact my psychiatrist)

But I hadn‚Äôt known it would turn into mania bc I hadn‚Äôt been diagnosed yet, so I was rather reckless for the few days before it got really bad. 

Looking back at past episodes, alcohol always had the effect of helping me for a bit and then making me a lot worse when I‚Äôd sober up

My best advice is to avoid alcohol at all costs as well as any drug with a psychoactive effect, plus get a healthy and routine amount of sleep.

I agree completely, which is why I want them to do it. I‚Äôd bet a lot of developers felt the same but still want to realize a full underwater Zelda world! 

It‚Äôs opportunity with lots and lots of risk, but a seamless open world with both land and water would be beautiful
Underwater = BotW hyrule, everything new is the New Hyrule

I did the same thing with my most recent restart, plus the rule that wolf link must be with me at all times possible (if he dies I reload a save)

It has made the adventure so much bigger yet also so much less lonely haha
this is what my manic episodes feel like except with a hyperfixation on the map in the corner. I‚Äôm showing this to my psychiatrist

I always thought I was crazy bc I couldn‚Äôt watch certain shows / listen to certain songs / [whatever minor experience] without feeling as if there was no point to life after that. Like I kept slipping into seriously depressed states like how bizarre lmaooo you‚Äôre not alone!!

I‚Äôve been in this exact kind of situation too many times to be ok haha

Most recent breakdown was over a laptop not connecting to a printer, and I literally contemplated overdosing on my meds for like an hour amidst the raging

I guess the best support I can offer is: these things happen and it sucks. They happen when you‚Äôre not doing good, they happen randomly when you think you‚Äôre doing good. I‚Äôm personally afraid of what I‚Äôll destroy in those moments

but all we can do is forgive ourselves once the emotions settle down

Yeah I‚Äôve been recommending crazy ex for the past year (it was the reason I knew to bring bpd up with my therapist in the first place haha)

I still just kinda feel like nothing really captures the experience the way I want to explain it, so it feels like the people close to me are just forced to live it firsthand with me

I‚Äôm really happy someone posted about Spinning Out here. It really affected me as well and I‚Äôve been thinking about recommending it to friends and family as a way to kinda show what this feels like 
Edit: also I think there was one line, maybe related to meds, about feeling like walking a tightrope. That idea has stuck with me for a bit, especially since I‚Äôve been considering going off meds

I watched Crazy ex girlfriend. Rebecca‚Äôs entire experience was frighteningly similar to mine, so I brought it up to a psychiatrist and therapist. They diagnosed me like 3 weeks later.

It‚Äôs strange to admit that that show saved my life because I wouldn‚Äôt have gotten the right help at the right time if I didn‚Äôt know it was bpd. I‚Äôm thinking about getting a pretzel tattoo to commemorate it lol
Yeah first two was only 3 days, but most recent time I was in for 8 days, and that one wasn‚Äôt even an attempt. I hate how normal psychiatric hospitalization has become for me üòï
I made this meme and panicked bc I thought no one would relate and now I‚Äôm panicking bc so many people relate and that‚Äôs fuckin me up rn

Honestly can‚Äôt remember it, I blocked most of that day out of my memory,

But probably not, it was arizona nothing special

Oh there‚Äôs a limit, I had to take a Lyft last time haha. I decided to do a shared lyft and was sitting with like 3 other people with my clear plastic hospital bag of all my belongings. At that point I was shameless, though üòí
First two times I was hospitalized food was awful, but third time it was incredible. Basically whatever you wanted, you got. Big city hospitalization perks, I guess

My experience was similar: bouncing from diagnosis to diagnosis before discovering BPD outside of therapy. I read all about it and related to basically everything. Eventually I brought it to a. We therapist and psychiatrist.

What they both told me was they weren‚Äôt comfortable giving a diagnosis upon early meetings. After a few sessions we went through the criteria together to see if it felt like me, and that‚Äôs when I was formally diagnosed.

I think the weird thing about bpd is how it can manifest as so many other things if your clinician doesn‚Äôt have the big, lifelong picture. Bringing it up first can at least put it on their radar and help them understand you more, even if it involves ruling that diagnosis out. 

TL;DR Don‚Äôt wait to let them figure it out, provide them with your own information and inferences to help them make a more informed decision and treatment plan. In any case, I hope this helps!! It‚Äôs tough out there :/
Heck yeah I‚Äôve been wanting to get the shadow symbol! What made you choose this one?

How long? It took about 2 months from starting at 75 to start feeling any better, but there were some really rough times leading up to that. Mostly brain fog / zaps and pretty intense depression.

If it‚Äôs been more than a long enough time for the benefits to kick in, it might be time to look into easing off and trying something new

I‚Äôm on 75mg Zoloft a day and 100mg of lamictal

My psychiatrist intended the Zoloft to keep the lows from being as hopelessly low. I‚Äôve definitely noticed I haven‚Äôt been as depressed, and suicidal thoughts come and go but I rarely feel an urge to act on them.

However, I‚Äôve basically had the entire summer off and away from stressors, so that was also a likely factor in my mood. School starts up again soon so we‚Äôll see how meds stabilize me, but I‚Äôm optimistic. 

Meds are different for everyone, though. Only way to know for sure is to try (to the extent that it‚Äôs safe to do so)
I didn‚Äôt even know that haha that‚Äôs a much easier way to get it

I took a picture when I was doing the stolen heirloom side quest. After you fight the yiga you have to put the orb in the platform, but instead I built a campfire and tried to pass time. It didn‚Äôt let me lol
Also couldn‚Äôt fast travel anywhere

Buneary is the only non-legendary/mythical Pok√©mon with a base friendship of 0.

In other words, Buneary is one of very few Pok√©mon who hates you from day one.

I‚Äôm a guy, always got attached to men. Thought I was gay for 8 years because of all these really intense crushes and relationships and realized I was in fact also attracted to women, but never had close relationships with any. 

To this day I identify as bisexual but I‚Äôm all but certain I‚Äôll end up with a guy, if anyone. I blame it on daddy issues

I got my ears pierced (each lobe, two in my right cartilage) and seven tattoos, 3 of which were impulses. Wouldn‚Äôt change a thing, especially the tattoos because right now they‚Äôre the only sense of permanency I can really feel.

Thank you for playing!! Yeah I debated so much where to put the flags, and decided to make the last two sections a ‚Äúfinal push.‚Äù I want to go back and balance the sections a bit more to feel more fair. The goal IS to keep people from putting it down after all haha. 

i remember losing so often at The Impossible Game first level near the same triple spikes at the end, and I wanna perfect that same feeling of finally conquering a fair challenge.
For the longest time I thought ghost was weak to psychic because the ghastly line, the only ghost types of gen 1, were also poison type. :/

I‚Äôve dyed my hair probably 9-10 times in the past two years

I got lucky about not damaging it because I keep my hair super short, so the dyed hair just grows out and gets cut off and I start all over again

This, plus tattoos and piercings. They‚Äôre tough impulses to fight.

I feel the same. In the run I‚Äôm doing now I‚Äôm stopping to read every diary and talk to every NPC. It really paints a picture of the world they live in and the kinds of struggles that accompany giant robots going rogue haha.

I feel that BotW‚Äôs plot is just like its gameplay: up to the player to discover.
If you‚Äôre thinking of Hexagon Heat, you‚Äôre not alone

Noivern is my favorite Pok√©mon, you‚Äôre definitely not alone! It‚Äôs a fun challenge trying to use Noibat from the start of a game because it evolves so late, but I always get so attached by the end.

I was just thinking about this and was going to make a post. My thoughts sort of drifted to how apparent people‚Äôs love for the series is with every post. I also don‚Äôt feel like I get that from other communities, at least not to this degree. 

It makes sense, then, that a community that loves the art so wholeheartedly will take its time to understand it.

Update: found it!!! I‚Äôm like 1500 rupees richer. Thank you everyone for your kindness!!
Now to find this rumored golf game...
I‚Äôm down
